custom.axisLabel: Number of processed request per second

Number of model loading per second

targets.expr:
sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
      sum by (pod) (modelmesh_instance_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}/1024),
      "deployment",
      "$2 usage",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )

sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
      sum by (pod) (modelmesh_instance_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"servicename-$runtime-.*"}/1024),
      "deployment",
      "$2 capacity",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
)

sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
      sum by (pod) (modelmesh_models_with_failure_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}) ,
      "deployment",
      "$2-failed models",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    ))

sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
      sum by (pod) (modelmesh_instance_models_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}),
      "deployment",
      "$2-loaded models",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
)

custom.axisLabel: Number of processed request per second

targets.expr:
sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
      sum by (pod) (rate(modelmesh_invoke_model_milliseconds_count{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval])),
      "deployment",
      "$2 external request",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    ))

avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_request_size_bytes_sum{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 request size",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )
/
  avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_request_size_bytes_count{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 request size",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )

avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_response_size_bytes_sum{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 response size",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )
/
  avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_response_size_bytes_count{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 response size",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )

panels.title: Average Inference Request and Response Sizes

custom.axisLabel: Number of model loading per second

targets.expr:
sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
sum by (pod) (increase(modelmesh_loadmodel_milliseconds_count{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval])),
      "deployment",
      "$2 loads",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
)

sum by (deployment) ( 
	label_replace(
sum by (pod) (increase(modelmesh_loadmodel_failure{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval])),
      "deployment",
      "$2 failures",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
)

avg by (deployment) (
  label_replace(
    avg by (pod) (
      rate(
        modelmesh_loaded_model_size_bytes_sum{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
      )
    ),
    "deployment",
    "$2 model size",
    "pod",
    "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
  )
)

/

avg by (deployment) (
  label_replace(
    avg by (pod) (
      rate(
        modelmesh_loaded_model_size_bytes_count{namespace="modelmesh-serving",pod=~"modelmesh-serving-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
      )
    ),
    "deployment",
    "$2 model size",
    "pod",
    "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
  )
)

avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_loadmodel_milliseconds_sum{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 loading time",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )
/
  avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_loadmodel_milliseconds_count{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 loading time",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )

avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_model_sizing_milliseconds_sum{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 sizing time",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )
/
  avg by (deployment) (
    label_replace(
      avg by (pod) (
        rate(
          modelmesh_model_sizing_milliseconds_count{namespace="$namespace",pod=~"$servicename-$runtime-.*"}[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "deployment",
      "$2 sizing time",
      "pod",
      "(modelmesh-serving)-(.*?)-(.*)"
    )
  )
